page.title: 12Holiday Camp - Paignton
page.content: {Bluecoats} Bluecoats look after the social life of the campers. She told us that not many campers were lost. She is in charge of 55 people a week and about 250 in the summer. She has one day a week off and has been a bluecoat for two years and during the season lives on the camp. There are 80 bluecoats altogether. {Administration A person in the office told us that there are about 850 people in the camp each week, roughly 14,000 per season and that there are 340 chalets. In the winter 20 people are needed to maintain the camp whilst in the summer they need 1800 staff. They have lots of lost property handed in. Bookings are all dealt withg by a computer. They have many large parties. Animals are forbidden.
